title: Japan Penguin Found Safe 2 Weeks After Escape, Keeper Calls It "A Miracle"
content: A fugitive penguin in Japan has been found safe and sound two weeks after escaping into the sea and paddling for miles, in what her keeper called a "miracle".
summary: A fugitive penguin in Japan has been found safe and sound two weeks after escaping into the sea and paddling for miles, in what her keeper called a "miracle".

title: Opinion: India-Pak Peace Is Possible - Only If Pak Army Takes A Back Seat
content: If India and Pakistan have tepid bilateral relations today, it is because the Pakistan army appears reluctant to allow civilian governments to build a warm relationship with India.
summary: If India and Pakistan have tepid bilateral relations today, it is because the Pakistan army appears reluctant to allow civilian governments to build a warm relationship with India.

title: Trump Makes Surprise 'Spin Room' Visit After Debate With Harris
content: Minutes after being hustled by Kamala Harris during their US presidential debate on Tuesday, Donald Trump appeared in front of reporters to get the last word.
summary: Minutes after being hustled by Kamala Harris during their US presidential debate on Tuesday, Donald Trump appeared in front of reporters to get the last word.

title: Palestine Takes Seat Among UN Member States At 79th General Assembly Session
content: The 79th session of the UN General Assembly kicked off in New York with the presence of the representatives of Palestine, who have been given a seat in the General Assembly Hall next to the UN member states.
summary: The 79th session of the UN General Assembly kicked off in New York with the presence of the representatives of Palestine, who have been given a seat in the General Assembly Hall next to the UN member states.

title: Pakistan Jolted By 5.7 Magnitude Earthquake, Tremors Felt In India
content: A 5.7 magnitude earthquake jolted parts of Pakistan, including the capital Islamabad, on Wednesday, according to the country's meteorological department.
summary: A 5.7 magnitude earthquake jolted parts of Pakistan, including the capital Islamabad, on Wednesday, according to the country's meteorological department.

title: Iran President Visits Iraq On First Foreign Trip Amid Political Turmoil
content: Iran's new president, Masoud Pezeshkian, began a visit to Iraq on Wednesday, aiming to deepen already close ties with the neighbouring country on his first trip abroad since taking office.
summary: Iran's new president, Masoud Pezeshkian, began a visit to Iraq on Wednesday, aiming to deepen already close ties with the neighbouring country on his first trip abroad since taking office.

title: "Trump Is Cooked": Internet Reacts To Crucial US Presidential Debate
content: Former US President Donald Trump and Vice President Kamala Harris on Tuesday faced off in their first presidential debate, sparking an immediate wave of reactions online.
summary: Former US President Donald Trump and Vice President Kamala Harris on Tuesday faced off in their first presidential debate, sparking an immediate wave of reactions online.

title: Japan Might Have Driverless Bullet Trains By Mid-2030s
content: Shinkansen bullet trains could be whizzing around Japan without drivers from the mid-2030s, one of its main rail operators said, motivated in part by the country's demographic crisis.
summary: Shinkansen bullet trains could be whizzing around Japan without drivers from the mid-2030s, one of its main rail operators said, motivated in part by the country's demographic crisis.

title: Iran Threatens Action Against Western Sanctions Over Arms Supply To Russia
content: Iran has vowed to respond to fresh sanctions imposed by Britain, France and Germany over what they said was its supply of short-range missiles to Russia for use in Ukraine.
summary: Iran has vowed to respond to fresh sanctions imposed by Britain, France and Germany over what they said was its supply of short-range missiles to Russia for use in Ukraine.

title: "I Don't Think Hosts Were Fair To...": Musk After Trump-Harris Debate
content: Elon Musk is endorsing Donald Trump in the 2024 US elections.
summary: Elon Musk is endorsing Donald Trump in the 2024 US elections.

title: BJP Attacks Rahul Gandhi For Meeting "Anti-India" US Lawmaker Ilhan Omar
content: BJP leaders have severely criticized Congress leader and Lok Sabha LoP Rahul Gandhi following his meeting with US Congresswoman Ilhan Omar in the United States.
summary: BJP leaders have severely criticized Congress leader and Lok Sabha LoP Rahul Gandhi following his meeting with US Congresswoman Ilhan Omar in the United States.

title: The US Media Verdict On High-Stakes Donald Trump-Kamala Harris Debate
content: US media gave the edge to Democratic Presidential nominee Kamala Harris in her heated debate with her Republican rival Donald Trump.

title: Donald Trump Says He Doesnt Care About Kamala Harris' Racial Identity
content: Former President Donald Trump said he does not care how Vice-President Kamala Harris identified racially. Harris' mother was from India and her father was from Jamaica. She identified both as black and Indian American.
summary: Former President Donald Trump said he does not care how Vice-President Kamala Harris identified racially. Harris' mother was from India and her father was from Jamaica. She identified both as black and Indian American.

title: Musks AI Side Gig Should Keep Its Distance From Tesla
content: If Tesla were to now actually invest billions in xAI, and/or share revenue with it, the potential conflict of interest could hardly be clearer.

title: Weight Loss Drug Safe, Effective For Children Under 12, Shows New Study
content: A weight loss drug has been found to be broadly safe and effective for children under 12 with obesity, according to a small study on Wednesday that was cautiously welcomed by outside experts.
summary: A weight loss drug has been found to be broadly safe and effective for children under 12 with obesity, according to a small study on Wednesday that was cautiously welcomed by outside experts.

title: Energy Drinks And Caffeine Craze Comes At A Cost For Impoverished Afghans
content: A production line in a warehouse in western Afghanistan churns out 24 energy drinks every second, feeding a thirst for the tonic used to mask life's hardships and lift wilting spirits.
summary: A production line in a warehouse in western Afghanistan churns out 24 energy drinks every second, feeding a thirst for the tonic used to mask life's hardships and lift wilting spirits.

title: US Prisoner's Wife Wins $5.6 Million In Settlement For Strip Search

title: Girl Genitalia Mutilated, Sold For Magic In Ivory Coast

title: Taylor Swift's "Childless Cat Lady" Post Backs Harris. Elon Musk Replies
